text:
The research team said it could calculate risk scores for five diseases simply by reanalyzing the kind of raw data people receive after sending a cheek swab to companies like 23andMe.

Peter Dazeley / Getty Images
title: Multigene test may find risk for heart disease, diabetes and breast cancer

og.title: Multigene test may find risk for heart disease, diabetes and breast cancer
og.description: A new way of measuring millions of small genetic variations that add up to cause harm allows researchers to calculate a person's inherited risk for common diseases.
